author: Vu H
title: Very comfortable and quiet
text: I love the stay here room very clean and comfortable hotel locate right at timesquare the price little expensive but its new york city if could have free parking that even better cuz i have to pay $35 for whole not bad no complaint just suggestions in furture for hotel
